title: Vayne+Guinsoo's Rageblade
body: Why are you allowing Vayne's W - Silver Bolts to proc with Guinsoo's? She was melting tanks before, and now they're nonexistent against her. It's broken beyond all reason and is infuriating to the point I don't want to play League 95% of the time anymore because people don't ban Vayne; and when I do it's a "crime against humanity" or some other BS.

replies.body: I'm confused, this isn't a recent change. Why are you acting like it is?
I've never seen a Vayne build Rageblade before 8.9.

That's doesn't mean players didn't build it before, you just didn't see it much. Similarly no one built lucian with bork + BC until it became popular in korea. 
With like 30 seconds of googling, you can find guinsoo vayne builds back in s6, and probably earlier.
Guinsoo vayne has been meta for atleast a year now though, so again
>I'm confused, this isn't a recent change. Why are you acting like it is?
You're clearly missing the point. Vayne renders tanks useless. Procing Silver Bolts % Max HP Damage EVERY other auto is beyond broken as hell.
